pullrequest.title: Add function to remove filter in ContactManager

content.raw:
You've added this function, but there's nothing that calls it other than the test. You say the sensors don't need to call it because the physics thread finishes first, but what if a model containing a sensor is deleted? It should remove the filter in that case.

I see
[Gripper.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/3bd08807f5d9997e9d51eed9276350bac523c4bf/gazebo/physics/Gripper.cc?at=default#cl-107),
[Link.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/3bd08807f5d9997e9d51eed9276350bac523c4bf/gazebo/physics/Link.cc?at=default#cl-199),
[ContactSensor.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/3bd08807f5d9997e9d51eed9276350bac523c4bf/gazebo/sensors/ContactSensor.cc?at=default#cl-115), and
[SonarSensor.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/3bd08807f5d9997e9d51eed9276350bac523c4bf/gazebo/sensors/SonarSensor.cc?at=default#cl-169) calling CreateFilter, and I think they should all call RemoveFilter during teardown in case they get deleted before the end of the simulation.
content.html:
You've added this function, but there's nothing that calls it other than the test. You say the sensors don't need to call it because the physics thread finishes first, but what if a model containing a sensor is deleted? It should remove the filter in that case.

I see Gripper.cc, Link.cc, ContactSensor.cc, and SonarSensor.cc calling CreateFilter, and I think they should all call RemoveFilter during teardown in case they get deleted before the end of the simulation.

pullrequest.title: Add function to remove filter in ContactManager

content.raw:
Good point about model being deleted before the end of the simulation, I forgot about that. 

I added `RemoveFitler` calls in the above three classes  in 44e445f
content.html:
Good point about model being deleted before the end of the simulation, I forgot about that.

I added RemoveFitler calls in the above three classes in 44e445f

pullrequest.title: Add function to remove filter in ContactManager

content.raw:
I think there's just one more in Link.cc:
~~~
diff -r 2635f5292922 gazebo/physics/Link.cc
--- a/gazebo/physics/Link.cc	Mon Feb 10 14:48:19 2014 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/physics/Link.cc	Mon Feb 10 16:39:55 2014 -0800
@@ -276,6 +276,8 @@
   }
 
 #ifdef HAVE_OPENAL
+  this->world->GetPhysicsEngine()->GetContactManager()->RemoveFilter(
+    this->GetScopedName() + "/audio_collision");
   this->audioSink.reset();
 #endif
 
~~~
content.html:
I think there's just one more in Link.cc:

@@ -276,6 +276,8 @@
   }

 #ifdef HAVE_OPENAL
+  this->world->GetPhysicsEngine()->GetContactManager()->RemoveFilter(
+    this->GetScopedName() + "/audio_collision");
   this->audioSink.reset();
 #endif
